quote: You´re my son, Ed. You might be idiotic and irresponsible, but it doesn´t make the slightest difference to what I feel for you. I´m pissed off that you could have thought it would
quote_letters: YOURE MY SON ED YOU MIGHT BE IDIOTIC AND IRRESPONSIBLE BUT IT DOESNT MAKE THE SLIGHTEST DIFFERENCE TO WHAT I FEEL FOR YOU IM PISSED OFF THAT YOU COULD HAVE THOUGHT IT WOULD
